description:
Advice on Planning and Listed Building Consent is sought for the following proposals:
1.1 Recovering butterfly roof slate and lead.
1.2 New double height glazed rear extension, all in painted metal
1.3 Re-constructed and extended closet wing to match height of neighbours at No.34A.
1.4 Adjustments to fenestration including relocation of LGF Front window, 3 new rooflights to main roof and 1No to closet wing roof.
1.5 Internal adjustments to openings in partitions.
1.6 Lowering floor level of Kitchen in Lower Ground Floor
1.7 Conversion of Vaults into ancillary spaces, inc. lowering floor level
1.8 Alterations to front garden including reconstruction of front steps and landing, reconstruction of steps to lightwell; new/repositioned ironwork to match original, minor adjustments to paving surfaces.
1.9 Rear Garden Landscaping inc. reconstructed steps, extended lower terrace, new rear paved seating area
